attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to try and stay informed with the presidentâ€™s news and all things Donald. But as soon as it actually downloaded (it took about 3 days!!!!!) i opened it, and was met with a black screen and a blaring siren sound. I wondered what was going on, and all of a sudden, i was met with hundreds of small rodents attacking my family, including my pets. 
They were still attacking, crawling up and clawing us all. I crawled over to reach my phone to turn the siren off, hoping the rodents would stop coming, however I couldnâ€™t turn it off and they just kept coming. So i called the police next. They said to me â€œthe real rodents are those black peopleâ€ and hung up immediately. 
I reached again for the app. Surely, my president would save me from this rodent hell. I opened the app to file my complaint then and there, but then i received a call from Donald Trump himself! 
â€œPresident! Please, save me and my family!â€ I cried to him. â€œNo,â€ he said â€œyou are the rodentsâ€™ now!â€ 
Immediately after he hung up, a giant black hole opened in my kitchen. All of my things began to slip in. The rodents cried out in glee. Their plan was working. They all chanted â€œDonald Trump, our rodent king!â€ over and over. 
At this point, my husband and dog had died from the attacks. The rodents dragged their lifeless bodies down into the hole. I cried, â€œWhy Donald Trump 2020 app, why?!â€ 
Eventually all of the rodents jumped in to the hole, trying to get me to join them. I could not. I held on to anything i could, until the hole finally closed and took everyone but myself with it. 
All in all, I do not recommend this app. I still donâ€™t know where my family members are, and i miss them terribly. Still voting for trump though.
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review:
I was trying to get this app, like any good American would. But it took four weeks to download and rendered every single one of the electronics in my city during that time. I got many complaints from my neighbors, and I was forced to retreat into my house so I wouldnâ€™t get slaughtered by one of them in a fit of passion. Also, the screen of my phone emitted a strange deadly gas once I started downloading it, and it killed my entire family. Then it brought them back to life, but they were different. They were zombies. The skin of their faces was rotting, and they kept trying to eat me. This on its own wouldnâ€™t have been that bad, but suddenly â€” prepare yourself â€” they became the worst thing of all. 
LIBERALS.
Suddenly it was all â€œBlack Lives Matterâ€ and â€œBreonna Taylorâ€™s killers have still not been put to justice, there is a petition online to get them arrested, go sign itâ€ and â€œLGBTQ+ people deserve to be treated as if theyâ€™re humanâ€.
My family is now as disgusting as those so called â€œprotestersâ€! 
Also, the app attracted every termite in the world, and they chewed down my house. I am now homeless and being forced to eat my own feces since all stores are closed for COVID-19. I soon shall not have any feces left. I fear for my own life. This app is cursed. If you download it, make sure to have the skills to survive an apocalypse. Which this app also caused. 
But anyway, you have to be a good citizen! Download the app today. Even though the app itself, once downloaded, is glitchy and the only thing it does is show a very unflattering picture of our president. Nothing else. It is, however, all completely worth it, so we can bask in the glory of the ğŸŠ! 
Good app overall
